title: Factory Employment, Machinery for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1919-1942 (2)--Original Data, 1939-1964. 1919-1942 Data For This Series Are Considered Roughly Comparable In Coverage. Source: Federal Reserve Board, Federal Reserve Bulletin, October 1938; October 1939; Monthly Issues Thereafter.

This NBER data series m08018b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08018b
